description: Retention of four air conditioning units on flat roof of ground floor rear extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The rating noise level emitted from the proposed development, as assessed under BS4142:1997 shall be lower than the existing background noise level during the period when the equipment is in use by at least 5 dBA at 3.5m from the nearest ground floor sensitive facade and 1m from the nearest first floor or higher noise sensitive facade.  REASON:   To protect the living conditions of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B8, ES5, Replacement UDP Policy 4.11. | Within 3 months of the date of this approval details shall submitted for approval before the development is commenced, to demonstrate that any machinery audible outside the premises will be designed to satisfy an acoustic standard not exceeding: 1. NR35 Leq,5mins, for plant which will operate during the period 2300 - 0700 hrs weekdays and anytime on Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays; 2. NR40 Leq,1hr for plant which is controlled by time switches only to run during the period 0700-2300hrs Mondays to Fridays, measured or calculated at 1m from the nearest facade of the nearest affected noise sensitive premises with all machines running together. The details so approved will be implemented within two months of that approval and permanently retained.  REASON:   To protect the living conditions of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B8, ES5, Replacement UDP Policy 4.11.
